info.title: Channel 4 API
info.description: This is the place to come for all the technical details you need to power your applications with Channel 4's deep programmes data.

get.summary: Clips Landing Feed Brand Series and Episode Levels
Clips Landing Feed Brand Series and Episode Levels(2)
Clips Landing Feed Brand Series and Episode Levels(3)

id.description: Unique identifier of this feed, including the programmeId

title.description: Title of brand for the programmeId

link@alternate.description: URL to HTML version of current feed

generator.description: Identifies the agent used to generate the feed

generator@version.description: Identifies the version of the agent used to generate the feed

dc:relation.platformClientVersion.description: Identifies the version of the client application compatible with this feed.

link@next.description: URL to next set of clips, if available

link@previous.description: URL to previous set of clips, if available

fh:complete.description: Presence of this element indicates no pagination

dc:relation.4oDProgrammeCount.description: Number of available 4oD episodes for this Brand

dc:relation.AllProgrammeCount.description: Number of available brands in this category beginning with this letter (all programmes)

Entry Elements.description: Element Description Example Value id ID containing Brand Web Safe Name tag:www.channel4.com,2009:/brand/inside-natures-giants title Programme's Brand Name Inside Nature's Giants summary Synopsis of this brand The award-winning series that gets under the skin of the largest animals on the planet. Most wildlife documentaries show how animals behave, but by exploring their anatomy, Inside Nature's Giants reveals how these creatures really work. updated Date and time element last updated 2010-10-18T10:08:44.295Z dc:relation.sortLetter  Starting letter for this programme I dc:relation.ProgrammeType  Displays metadata code (as detailed in the following table) in a meaningful way on the application according to the specified programme type. SSU dc:date.TXDate  Transmission date of the programme 2010-10-18T10:30:00.000Z media:content / media:thumbnail URL to medium-sized image of this brand url="http://www.channel4.com/assets/programmes/images/inside-natures-giants/7eb0ec03-1321-4532-bf51-cb2af0d9d528_145x82.jpg" height="82" width="145" link@alternate URL to HTML version of brand http://www.channel4.com/programmes/inside-natures-giants link@self URL to the Channel 4 XML feed for this brand http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx link@related (Official Site) URL to the brand's official site, if available link@related (4oD) URL to 4oD feed, if available (self-referential in 4oD feeds) http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants/4od.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx link@related (Clips) URL to short-form video feed, if available http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants/video.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx link@related (Episode Guide) URL to Episode Guide feed, if available http://api.channel4.com/pmlsd/inside-natures-giants/episode-guide.atom?apikey=xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

dc:relation.CategoryType.description: Type to which the category belongs (if applicable).(Valid values are 'Channel', 'Display' or 'None'.)

dc:relation.CategoryOrder.description: Enumerated order of category within its type(e.g., 'Channel' might have Food=1, More4=2, etc.)(Appears in feed only if CategoryType<>'None'.)

media:group / media:player.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:group /media:rating.description: Flag to show whether clip is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:group /media:restriction.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:group /media:rights.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

dc:relation.BrandTitle.description: Title of the brand for this feed

dcterms:available.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

dc:relation.SeriesNumber.description: Series to which this episode belongs

dc:relation.programmeId.description: Indicates the contract and programme numbers

dc:relation.RelatedEntryId.description: The episode guide entry related to this episode

dc:relation.AgeRating.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)

dc:relation.Guidance.description: Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable

dc:date.TXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.TXChannel.description: First TX channel information for this episode

dc:relation.Subtitles.description: Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode

dc:relation.AudioDescription.description: Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode

dc:relation.LoginRequired.description: Boolean indicating if the user has to be logged-in in order to play this episode.

dc:relation.ParentCollectionId.description: The ID of the Parent Collection where the resource is assigned to.

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium sized image of this series

Link@Related title=\"4oD\".description: URL to Brand 4oD feed, if available

dc:relation.ProgrammeType.description: Displays metadata code (as detailed in the following table) in a meaningful way on the application according to the specified programme type.

media:thumbnail /media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

dc:date.firstTXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.firstTXChannel.description: Channel of first broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG or, when EPG data is not available for the episode, it can be set editorially (significant date)

media:group / media:content / media:play.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:group / media:content / media:thum.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

media:group / media:content / media:rati.description: Flag to show whether episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:group / media:content / media:rest.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:group / media:content / media:righ.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

media:group / media:content / dc:relatio.description: Indicates STREAMING or FOR DOWNLOAD content

media:group / media:content / dcterms:av.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

media:group / media:content / dc:relatio.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)
Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable
Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode
Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode
Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

dc:relation.TotalResults.description: Number of entries what match the search-term

dc:relation.BrandFlattened.description: Boolean indicating whether there is no Series -> Episode structure in this brand ("false" indicating that there is such a structure)

dc:relation.BrandWebSafeTitle.description: Title of the brand safe for web linking (no whitespaces, no special chars...)

dc:relation.4oDSeriesCount.description: Number of available 4oD series for this Brand

dc:relation.New4oDSeriesAvailable.description: Flags that notifies clients when a Brand contains NEW series.

dc:relation.Sharable.description: Boolean value indicating if clips for this brand are sharable

link@related (4oD Episode).description: URL to 4oD HTML (player page) if available

media:group /media:player.description: URL to media-player version of full episode

media:group/media:category.description: Defines the type of short-form item. Its value can be one of the next: EXTRACT, PREVIEW, EXTRA, TRAILER

dc:relation.ExternalVideoId.description: Clip Asset_id value from the Clip table (a.k.a. Brightcode id).

link@related (Clips).description: URL to Short form video feed, if available

dc:relation.firstTXDate.description: Date of first broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG or, when EPG data is not available for the episode, it can be set editorially (significant date)

dc:relation.lastTXDate.description: Date of last broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG ignoring repeats and giving preference to the channel that the brand is primarily targeted at (preferred channel)

dc:relation.lastTXChannel.description: Channel of last broadcast (optional). This is based on EPG ignoring repeats and giving preference to the channel that the brand is primarily targeted at (preferred channel)

link@related (Episode Guide).description: URL to Episode Guide feed, if available

category (secondary).description: Secondary category (brand may have any number)

dc:relation.comingSoonTo4oD.description: If the brand is coming to be available on 4oD soon this empty element should be included.

link@alternate.description: URL to HTML version, i.e., player page

link@related.description: URL to Episode Guide feed, if available

dc:relation.ProgrammeType.description: Displays metadata code (as detailed in the following table) in a meaningful way on the application according to the specified programme type.

link@related (4oD).description: URL to HTML version of 4oD page for this series, if available

link@related (Clips).description: URL to feed of video clips for this series

link@related (Episode Guide).description: URL to feed of full episode, if available

dcterms:available.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

dc:relation.SeriesNumber.description: The series to which this episode belongs

dc:relation.EpisodeNumber.description: The episode number within the series

dc:relation.AgeRating.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)

dc:relation.Guidance.description: Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable

dc:date.TXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.TXChannel.description: First TX channel information for this episode

dc:relation.Subtitles.description: Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode

dc:relation.AudioDescription.description: Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode

dc:relation.Duration.description: Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

media:group / media:player.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:group /media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

media:group /media:rating.description: Flag to show whether episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:group /media:restriction.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:group /media:rights.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

dc:relation.programmeId.description: The contract number/programme number for episode.

dc:date.firstTXDate.description: First TX date information for this episode

dc:relation.firstTXChannel.description: First TX channel information for this episode

dc:date.slotTXDate.description: Current TX date information for this slot's episode

dc:relation.slotTXChannel.description: Current TX channel information for this slot's episode

media:group / media:content / media:play.description: URL to media-player version of episode

media:group / media:content / media:thum.description: URL to medium-sized image of this episode

media:group / media:content / media:rati.description: Flag to show whether episode is suitable for adults only ("adult") or for all viewers ("nonadult")

media:group / media:content / media:rest.description: Restriction flag ("allow") and list of country or state codes where episode is accessible to website users

media:group / media:content / media:righ.description: Status of media rights under which Channel 4 provides episode content

media:group / media:content / dc:relatio.description: Indicates STREAMING or FOR DOWNLOAD content

media:group / media:content / dcterms:av.description: Start date, end date and date/time format for the period of time when episode is available.  (This feed would not be available if the current date is outside the start and end dates.)

media:group / media:content / dc:relatio.description: Channel 4-specific recommended lower age-limit for viewers (0, 16 or 18)
Channel 4-specific warning text about specific disturbing content, adult humour, nudity, etc., if applicable
Boolean indicating if subtitles are available for this episode
Boolean indicating if an audio description is available for this episode
Length in minutes and seconds - does not include ad breaks

media:group /media:category.description: Defines the type of short-form item.

dc:relation.ExternalVideoId.description: This is the clip asset id (from column CLIP_ASSET.ASSET_ID. For the current implementation this is the Brightcove Id.

dc:relataion.BrandTitle.description: Title for the brand that the clip is associated with (directly or indirectly)

dc:relataion.BrandWebSafeTitle.description: Web-safe title for the brand that the clip is associated with (directly or indirectly)

media:group /media:player.description: URL to media-player version of episode

dc:relation.BrandWebSafeTitle.description: Programme's Brand name in Web safe format

media:context / media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium-sized image of this brand

link@related (Official Site).description: URL to the brand's official site, if available

generator.description: Identifies the agent used to generate the feed

generator@version.description: Identifies the version of the agent used to generate the feed

dc:relation.platformClientVersion.description: Identifies the version of the client application compatible with this feed.

link@relative (Official Site).description: URL to the brand's official site, if available

link@relative (4oD).description: URL to 4oD feed, if available (self-referential in 4oD feeds)

link@relative (Clips).description: URL to short-form video feed, if available

link@relative (Episode Guide).description: URL to Episode Guide feed, if available

link@related (All Programmes by Title).description: All programmes in category by title

link@related (4oD Programmes by TX Date).description: 4oD programmes in category by TX date

dc:relation.CategoryType.description: Type to which the category belongs (if applicable). (Valid values are 'Channel', 'Display' or 'None'.)

dc:relation.CategoryOrder.description: Enumerated order of category within its type (e.g., 'Channel' might have Food=1, More4=2, etc.) (Appears in feed only if CategoryType<>'None'.)

dc:relation.AllProgrammeCount.description: Number of available brands in this category (all programmes)

dc:relation.4oDProgrammeCount.description: The number of 4oD available programmes in the collection, including all Brand/Series/Episodes.

media:thumbnail.description: URL to medium sized image of this brand

Link@Related title=\"Episode Guide\".description: URL to brand episode guide feed

Link@Related title=\"4oD\".description: URL to Brand 4oD feed, if available

dc:relation.ParentCollectionId.description: The ID of the Parent Collection where the resource is assigned to.

dc:relation.Repeat.description: Boolean indicating if the Slot includes an indicator marked as repeat.

dc:relation.LoginRequired.description: Boolean indicating if the user has to be logged-in in order to play this episode.

dc:relation.SimulcastRights.description: Boolean indicating if the episode has rights to be streamed on the live simulcast service.

dc:relation.Movie.description: Boolean indicating if the SLOT is a Movie or not.

dc:relation.comingSoonTo4oD.description: If the brand is coming to be available on 4oD soon this empty element should be included.

dc:relation.hd.description: Boolean indicating if the SLOT is HD on linear

dc:relation.RelatedEntryId.description: The episode guide entry related to this episode

dc:relation.TXStartTime.description: Start date and time of the broadcast

dc:relation.WideScreen.description: Boolean value is true if widescreen slot_indicator exists for this slot, otherwise false

dc:relation.Signing.description: Boolean value is true if signing slot_indicator exists for this slot, otherwise false.

link@rel=alternate @type=text/html.description: URL to HTML version of brand (if available)

link@rel=self@type=application/atom+xml.description: URL of ATOM feed of current brand

link@rel=related@title=4oD.description: URL of ATOM 4oD feed of current brand (if available)

link@rel=related@title=Clips.description: URL of ATOM Clips feed of current brand (if available)

link@rel=related@title=Episode Guide.description: URL of ATOM Episode Guide details feed of current brand (if available)

media:content /media:credit.description: List of credits/cast for the episode

dc:date.Last.description: Timestamp of the previous TX from this brand (if applicable)

dc:relation.LastChannel.description: The channel on which the previous TX from this brand(if applicable)

dc:date.Next.description: Timestamp of the next TX from this brand (if applicable)

dc:relation.NextChannel.description: The channel on which the next TX from this brand (if applicable)

dc:relation.Platform.description: The platform code that this episode is available on
